pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Monday, April 19, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

10:30 a.m.  The Prime Minister will chair the Cabinet meeting.

4:00 p.m.  The Prime Minister will attend the Budget Speech, to be delivered by the Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Finance, Chrystia Freeland, in the House of Commons.
